attributes.action: Force train companies to lower prices to compete with the low budget airlines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment a fare to Glasgow from London can cost no less than £100 - £200. Budget airlines can do this for under £30 including the tax. Instead of constantly forcing strapped for cash people who choose to fly because its the cheapest option more tax all the time make the train companies compete with these airlines and open up great Britain for all to see without increasing carbon admissions.
